arabic_text: وَمَن يَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسْبُهُ
translation: And whoever relies upon Allah—then He is sufficient for him.

arabic_text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
Indeed, in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
So remember Me; I will remember you.
Indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
Indeed, with hardship comes ease.

arabic_text: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآ ۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسْمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ
translation: Do not fear; indeed, I am with you, hearing and seeing.
When the help of Allah and victory come.
And He found you lost and guided [you].

arabic_text: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُدَافِعُ عَنِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا
translation: Indeed, Allah defends those who believe.
Seek help through patience and prayer.

arabic_text: وَمَنْ يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَلْ لَهُ مَخْرَجًا
translation: And whoever fears Allah—He will make for him a way out.

arabic_text: وَلَا تَهِنُوا وَلَا تَحْزَنُوا وَأَنتُمُ الْأَعْلَوْنَ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
translation: Do not weaken and do not grieve; you will be superior if you are believers.

arabic_text: إِن يَنصُرْكُمُ اللَّهُ فَلَا غَالِبَ لَكُمْ
translation: If Allah supports you, none can overcome you.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.
Call upon Me; I will respond to you.
For indeed, with hardship comes ease.

arabic_text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ
translation: O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer.
If you support Allah, He will support you.

arabic_text: قُل لَّن يُصِيبَنَا إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ اللَّهُ لَنَا
translation: Say, 'Never will we be struck except by what Allah has decreed for us.'
Those who strive for Us—We will surely guide them to Our ways.
He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself.
Allah will bring about, after hardship, ease.

arabic_text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ مَا هُوَ شِفَاءٌ وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
translation: We send down of the Qur'an that which is healing and mercy for the believers.

arabic_text: لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا أَنتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers.
O reassured soul,
Do not despair of relief from Allah.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
Do not grieve; indeed, Allah is with us.

arabic_text: هُوَ الَّذِي أَنْزَلَ السَّكِينَةَ فِي قُلُوبِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
translation: It is He who sent down tranquility into the hearts of the believers.
Sufficient for us is Allah, and [He is] the best Disposer of affairs.
Allah will raise those who have believed among you.
Be just; that is nearer to righteousness.
And be patient. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
Allah keeps firm those who believe.

arabic_text: إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى الصَّابِرُونَ أَجْرَهُم بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
translation: Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account.

arabic_text: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اصْبِرُوا وَصَابِرُوا وَرَابِطُوا وَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ
translation: O you who have believed, persevere and endure and remain steadfast and fear Allah that you may succeed.

arabic_text: إِنَّهُ مَن يَتَّقِ وَيَصْبِرْ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجْرَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
translation: Indeed, whoever fears Allah and is patient—then indeed, Allah does not allow to be lost the reward of the doers of good.
And whoever believes in Allah—He guides his heart.
What is with Allah is better and more lasting.
Allah provides for them and for you.
And in the heaven is your provision and that which you are promised.

arabic_text: وَعَسَى أَنْ تَكْرَهُوا شَيْئًا وَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ
translation: Perhaps you dislike a thing and it is good for you.

arabic_text: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ قَالُوا رَبُّنَا اللَّهُ ثُمَّ اسْتَقَامُوا فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
translation: Indeed, those who say, 'Our Lord is Allah' and then remain steadfast—there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.

arabic_text: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
translation: Our Lord, grant us mercy from Yourself and prepare for us right guidance in our affair.
